backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking deployment-related files, components, and test IDs for the production publish workflow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text mapping frontend file paths to short functional summaries.
frontend/.github/workflows/production-pu: GitHub Actions workflow that validates the production slug and required files before publishing.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing production slug requirements and steps for safe production publishing.
frontend/domain-slug.json: Config file defining the canonical productionSlug value galfashionworld-2014.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables and dark mode definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/scripts/validate-production-slu: Node script that verifies domain-slug.json exists and contains the exact required productionSlug.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing the main site sections and layout.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section describing the company and displaying two product gallery images.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with email, phone, address details and embedded inquiry form.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Client-side validated contact form with simulated submission and success state.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Displays a features section with cards describing six company strengths using icons and styled layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with brand info, navigation links, services, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Implements a hero section with text, CTA buttons, and a video with fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/SectionLayout.ts: Wraps sections with consistent padding and container layout using a reusable component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, a custom color palette, dark mode variables, and global italic typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, typography, animations, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, deployment notes, and known issues for the Gal Fashion World single‑page marketing site.
